overview: James Carlin is the Co-Founder and President of Energy Results LLC, headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. Energy Results empowers homeowners to save energy and money through smart home upgrades. James is a former Executive Director of Investment Banking at JPMorgan Chase & Co., where he was responsible for raising over $100 billion in capital for a wide range of clients. James holds a BA in International Relations from the James Madison College of Public Affairs at Michigan State University and an MBA from The Booth School of Business at The University of Chicago with a concentration in finance, economics and accounting. For more information on Energy Results, please visit http://EnergyResults.com or email info@energyresults.com.
